subdisciplines.name: Queer and Trans Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the experiences and politics of queer and trans individuals, identities, cultures, and social movements.

subdisciplines.name: Sexual Health and Education
subdisciplines.description: The study of sexual health and wellbeing, including sexual education, reproductive health, and access to healthcare.

subdisciplines.name: Critical Race and Sexuality Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the intersection of race, ethnicity, and sexuality in various social, cultural, and political contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Sexual Violence and Abuse
subdisciplines.description: The study of sexual violence and abuse, including sexual assault, harassment, and exploitation, and strategies for prevention and intervention.
